name: Every Day Is Trans Day Of Vengeance
name_original: Every Day Is Trans Day Of Vengeance
description:
*THIS GAME IS INCOMPLETE, MAYBE ITLL B UPDATED ONE DAY BUT IDK* CONTROLS!!
  • move - A/D OR left/right
  • jump - space
  • throw water/slap sticker - E
  • slam/slow down - S OR down
  • pressing space while in the air lets u do a trick!!
EXTRA CONTROLS!!
  • reset level - R
  • open spotify playlist - return (EDIT: pressing return will open a different playlist that was deleted cause spotify bugged out n started adding songs to it randomly, the link here is the new n fuller playlist <3)
  • quit - escape
